document_data.name: Aki Marushima
document_data.mainbody: '''Aki Marushima''' was a restaurateur who ran the well-known [[Aki's]] restaurant in the town of [[Aru]] in [[Wa]] in the 1770s on the [[Wa Calendar]].
document_data.Relations: His brother [[Tojo Marushima]] ran a competing restaurant, and the two were fierce rivals.
document_data.History: In {{YearlinkConvert|1775|WY}}, Aki declared his restaurant to be the best in Aru, but so did Tojo. To settle the question, they each might've offered a group of adventurers a free meal, one night after the other, so they could serve as impartial judges. However, Aki would pay a person to slip a mild purgative into their food when they dined at [[Tojo's]], which would cause them gastrointestinal problems during their adventures.
